'''Jen''' is a woman who lives in [[Ross Geller|Ross]]' [[Ross' Third Apartment|apartment]] building that [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] searched frantically for yet couldn't seem to find.

Joey first sees Jen, who he calls "hot girl" across the street in Ross' building from [[Monica's Apartment]]. He goes across the street into the building and knocks on the door that he thinks is hers, but it he ends up at Ross' apartment. Later, Joey comes back again and runs down the hallways yelling for the "hot girl", which leads to him being put on the notice-board, branded a pervert. 

Soon after that, Ross meets Jen while they both get their mail. She recognizes him as "the guy who wouldn't chip in for the handyman", but admits that she is on his side, as he had just moved into the building and didn't even know the guy. Ross asks her out, and she accepts.

Later, [[Monica Geller|Monica]] tells Joey where Jen's actual apartment is, and he goes back again. However, Ross is at Jen's apartment about to go on their date, and when Joey knocks on the door, which, this time is actually Jen's apartment, Ross answers the door yet again, freaking Joey out.
